machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G28 X0 Y0 ; Home X Y
M375; Load Bed Leveling Grid
G1 X300 Y275 F15000 ; Move to bed center
M280 S3.0 ; Deploy probe pin
## NOTE: Adjust "ZX.XX" after G30 to be the Z-offset (in mm) between the probe and the nozzle
## This is how you adjust nozzle printing height!
G30 Z1.25 ; Move down to find bed & set Z home offset
M280 S7.0 ; Retract probe
G1 Z15.0 F600 ; move extruder up 15mm
T0; Activate Extruder 1

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G28 X0 Y0; Home X and Y
M104 S0 ; turn off extruder
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
M107; turn off fans
M84 ; disable motors
